name: Elite Cleansing Squad
description:
The germs are a dirty blight on the microscopic world, and therefore must be liberated. Soldier, it is your mission to infiltrate deep into the diseased heart of our enemy and make the world a better place for us: one shotgun blast at a time.

Elite Cleansing Squad is a top-down shooter featuring fast run-and-gun gameplay.  You will fight through the scum of the Earth and become a true War Hero. Are you enough of a masculine MAN to bring freedom to those who don't even know they want it?

This game won 1st prize in the Weekly Game Jam 30, with the theme "Not The Hero".
